title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the all-in-one solution for easy and effective floor cleaning. Designed with simplicity in mind, this Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop is perfect for our senior friends who want to keep their homes sparkling without the fuss and hassle.

**Effortless Cleaning for Every Surface**
Whether you have tile, sealed wood, laminate, or even area rugs, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max ensures your floors will look their best. No need to switch between tools - this one device vacuums and washes your floors at the same time!

**Cordless Convenience**
Say goodbye to tangled cords and hello to freedom of movement! With a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, you get up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time. You can navigate through your home effortlessly, reaching every nook and cranny without being tethered to a wall.

**Gentle on Floors, Tough on Dirt**
The rotating brush system and a generous 10.5-inch cleaning path make short work of dirt and spills, while the improved edge cleaning ensures baseboards and corners aren't neglected. Plus, with a swivel head, maneuvering around furniture is a breeze.

**Easy to Handle**
Featuring a convenient carry handle, the BISSELL CrossWave is easy to transport wherever you need it. Lightweight and user-friendly, it's designed with your comfort in mind.

**Self-Cleaning Technology**
When you're done cleaning, the self-cleaning cycle takes care of the machine. Just press a button, and the BISSELL CrossWave cleans itself—no mess, no stress.

**Support a Good Cause**
By choosing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, you're not just cleaning your home; you're supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, which helps save homeless pets. It's a purchase you can feel good about.

**Stay Connected**
With built-in WiFi capabilities, you can connect to the BISSELL Connect app for guidance, support, and an easy way to manage your cleaning schedule.

**What's in the Box**
Your BISSELL CrossWave comes with everything you need to get started, including 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls.

Make floor cleaning a seamless and satisfying part of your routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max. It’s the hassle-free way to maintain a clean and welcoming home, no matter your age or mobility. Order yours today and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with a spotless living space.

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - Your Easy-to-Use Cleaning Companion!**

Dear friends,

Are you looking for a hassle-free way to keep your home sparkling clean without the tangle of cords or the fuss of multiple cleaning tools? Look no further! The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is here to make your life easier and your floors spotless.

**Simple and Effective Cleaning:**
This all-in-one vacuum cleaner and mop is designed with you in mind. It effortlessly vacuums and washes your floors at the same time, saving you precious time and energy. With a rotating brush system and a wide 10.5-inch path, it covers more ground with every pass.

**Lightweight and Maneuverable:**
The CrossWave Cordless Max features a handy swivel head and a comfortable carry handle, making it a breeze to navigate around furniture and through all the rooms of your home, even for those of us with a few more years under our belt.

**Freedom from Cords:**
Enjoy up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning with the powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery. Say goodbye to the hassle of plugging and unplugging as you move from room to room.

**Safe on Multiple Surfaces:**
Whether you have tile, sealed wood, laminate, or area rugs, this cleaner is safe and effective on a variety of surfaces. Your floors will thank you!

**Easy to Maintain:**
With the push of a button, the self-cleaning cycle keeps the brush roll fresh and ready for the next use. Plus, the improved edge cleaning ensures no dirt is left behind.

**Stay Connected:**
For those who enjoy technology, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max comes with WiFi capabilities. You can connect it to the BISSELL Connect app for helpful alerts and easy maintenance tracking.

**Supporting a Great Cause:**
Feel good knowing that with every purchase, you're supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping our furry friends in need.

**What's Included:**
Your new cleaning friend comes with trial size formulas and brush rolls to get you started right out of the box.

Embrace the joy of effortless cleaning. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is not just a purchase; it's an investment in a cleaner, happier home. Bring one home today and see the difference for yourself!

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - Your Ultimate Cleaning Companion!**

Dear friends,

Are you tired of juggling multiple cleaning tools just to keep your floors spotless? We have something that will make your life easier! Meet the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the all-in-one vacuum cleaner and mop designed with your convenience in mind.

Here's why it's perfect for you:

**Effortless Operation:** No more tangled cords! This cordless wonder gives you the freedom to glide across your floors for up to 30 minutes on a single charge, thanks to its powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery.

**Versatile Cleaning:** Whether you have tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, or area rugs, the CrossWave Cordless Max confidently tackles dirt on various surfaces. Plus, it comes with a rotating brush system that ensures a thorough clean every time.

**User-Friendly Design:** With a swivel head and a handy carry handle, maneuvering and transporting this vacuum is a breeze, making it ideal for those of us who prefer not to fuss over complicated gadgets.

**Simple Maintenance:** After you're done cleaning, the self-cleaning cycle takes care of the machine, so it's ready for next time. And don't worry about messes – the improved edge cleaning makes sure that no speck of dust is left behind.

**Support a Cause:** Feel good knowing that with every purchase, you're supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping our furry friends in need.

**Stay Connected:** For those who enjoy a bit of technology, the BISSELL Connect app lets you stay in the loop with maintenance tips and support, right from your smartphone.

**Generous Accessories:** The package includes trial formulas and brush rolls to get you started, making it a complete cleaning system right out of the box.

Remember, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is not just a purchase; it's an investment in a cleaner, happier home. Simplify your cleaning routine and spend more time enjoying the things that matter most.

Warm regards,
The BISSELL Family

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max Vacuum Cleaner and Mop!**

Are you in search of a simple solution to keep your floors spotless without the hassle of cords and multiple cleaning tools? Look no further! The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is here to make cleaning a breeze for everyone, especially for our dear seniors who deserve all the convenience in the world.

**Why Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max?**

* **Cord-Free Convenience**: Say goodbye to tangled cords! With a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, enjoy up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning.
* **Effortless Handling**: Its rotating brush system and 10.5-inch cleaning path make quick work of dirt and spills. Plus, the swivel head and comfortable carry handle mean less strain on your back and arms.
* **Versatile Cleaning**: Whether your home has tile, wood, laminate, or area rugs, this all-in-one machine vacuums and washes your floors at the same time!
* **Easy Maintenance**: With a self-cleaning cycle and separate tanks for clean and dirty water, your CrossWave stays fresh and ready for the next use.
* **Smart Technology**: The BISSELL Connect app lets you operate your machine and access helpful tips right from your phone.
* **Support a Good Cause**: Feel good knowing that every purchase helps a pet in need through the BISSELL Pet Foundation.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max comes with a bundle of trial-size formulas and brush rolls, so you can start cleaning as soon as it arrives. It's the perfect helping hand for maintaining a tidy and welcoming home with minimal effort.

Caring for your home should be as simple and stress-free as possible. Order your BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max today and experience the joy of easy, effective cleaning!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the all-in-one cleaning solution designed with you in mind! Say goodbye to the hassle of cords and hello to the freedom of cordless cleaning. With the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, you can easily vacuum and wash your floors in one simple step. Its lightweight design, complete with a convenient carry handle, makes it perfect for everyone, especially our beloved elderly community.

- **Cordless Convenience**: Free yourself from the restrictions of cords. A powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery gives you up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time, allowing you to tackle all your floors without needing to recharge.

Stay connected with WiFi capabilities and BISSELL Connect app compatibility, making it simple to control your cleaning experience. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is not just a cleaning tool; it's a helping hand for maintaining a clean and inviting home.

For a cleaner home and a happier life, choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max. Cleaning has never been this easy or this rewarding!

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - Your Effortless Cleaning Companion!**

Are you tired of lugging around heavy vacuums or struggling with cords that just won’t reach? Say hello to the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the all-in-one solution that will make cleaning a breeze! Designed with ease and simplicity in mind, it’s perfect for our wise and experienced generation who appreciate a spotless home without the hassle.

**Why Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max?**

- **Cordless Freedom:** Enjoy up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time with the powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, allowing you to move from room to room without searching for an outlet.
- **Dual Function:** Why vacuum and then mop when you can do both at once? The CrossWave Cordless Max vacuums and washes your floors simultaneously, saving time and effort.
- **Easy Maneuvering:** The swivel head and rotating brush system glide across your floors, reaching every nook and cranny with ease. At 10.5 inches wide, it covers a good area without being bulky.
- **Gentle on Surfaces:** Whether it’s tile, sealed wood, laminate, linoleum, or even area rugs, this versatile cleaner is gentle yet effective on a variety of surfaces.
- **Simple to Carry:** With a handy carry handle, you can transport the vacuum from floor to floor or even upstairs without strain.
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle:** Keep your device fresh with the push of a button, thanks to the self-cleaning cycle – no more dirty brushes!
- **Support a Good Cause:** Feel good knowing that your purchase helps support the BISSELL Pet Foundation, dedicated to helping our furry friends in need.

**What’s Included?**

- 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
- 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
- 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Stay Connected:**

Even in our golden years, we can stay tech-savvy! The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max comes with WiFi connectivity, allowing you to pair it with the BISSELL Connect app for helpful cleaning tips and support.

Embrace the ease of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max – because you deserve a clean home and more time to enjoy the things you love. Get yours today and experience the joy of hassle-free cleaning!
